Embed YouTube videos in your Quarto documents using the metadata visible to the document. 

<!-- ## Embedding a YouTube Video -->
<h2 style="display: flex; align-items: center;">
  <img src="https://simpleicons.org/icons/youtube.svg" alt="YouTube Logo" style="height: 1em; margin-right: 0.5em;">
  Embedding a YouTube Video
</h2>

Embed a video like this.

<code>
 &lcub;{< youtube_video _VKxTPWDhA4 >}}
</code>

On rendering, the result looks like this:

{{< youtube_video _VKxTPWDhA4 >}}
